sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Usage">06cc597e1b053d94db5a97d0b24bcbcc</macroponent><name>stylized_text_187/css</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
	    var changePerc = api.data.verticale_headlinemetric1.output.result[0].changeperc;
     var direction = api.data.verticale_headlinemetric1.output.result[0].direction_label;

    if (direction == 'Maximize') {
        if (changePerc<0) {
            return '* { font-size: 16px; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-0))}';

        } else {
            return '* { font-size: 16px; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-0))}';
        }
    } else if (direction == 'Minimize')
        if (changePerc>0) {
             return '* { font-size: 16px; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-0))}';

        } else {
             return '* { font-size: 16px; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-0))}';
        }
    else {
        return '* { font-size: 16px; }';
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-06 21:11:28</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c59dd5b21b453d94db5a97d0b24bcb14</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_187/css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c59dd5b21b453d94db5a97d0b24bcb14</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-06 21:11:28</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
